price: 150. Welnee, Allah is jullie beschermer en Hij is de beste Helper.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
